author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
The LIMITED EDITION Alien Alert Pin is out now: https://shop.kgs.link/AlienAlert and it’s humanity’s first line of defense. Wear it, enjoy the compliments, but always, ALWAYS, keep an eye on the red light.
Every pin sale directly supports kurzgesagt, and may save humanity in the process. Only available until August 22  – then it vanishes forever.
